text: Sfondrati is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Francesco Sfondrati (1493–1550), Italian Roman Catholic bishop and cardinal and the father of Pope Gregory XIV * Niccolo Sfondrati (11 February 1535 – 16 October 1591), Pope known as Pope Gregory XIV * Paolo Emilio Sfondrati (1560 – 14 February 1618), Italian Cardinal * Celestino Sfondrati (10 January 1644 – 4 September 1696), Italian Benedictine theologian, Prince-abbot of St. Gall and Cardinal Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Sfondrati
